==Player.SetSkill==

|| *Syntax* || Player:SetSkill( strSkill:String, intAmount:Integer ) ||
|| *Return* || nill ||
|| *Description* || Set skill at number defined in arguments  ||
|| *Part of Library* || Player ||
|| *Type* || Shared ||
|| *File* || core/sharedfiles/sh_skills.lua ||

==Examples==

<code language="Lua">
Entity(5):SetSkill( "meele_weapon", "4" )

// I don't now if the skill 'meele_weapon' exsist ;D</code>
